subject: Management
title: The Briefback Technique
description: A short lesson to help you apply The Briefback Technique.

hook.text: Military commanders don't just give orders. They ask the soldier to repeat them back.

buildup.text: A briefback is asking the delegate to summarize what they'll do, by when, and with what support.

discovery.text: Briefbacks reveal misunderstandings immediatelyâ€”before any work begins.

twist.text: It feels awkward at first. But it catches 90% of misalignment in 30 seconds.

climax.text: End every handoff with 'Can you walk me back through the plan?' It's simple and powerful.

punchline.text: Ask them to say it back. Gaps appear fast.

quiz.question: What is the purpose of a briefback after delegating?
options: To catch misunderstandings before work starts
To test the person's memory skills
